status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"di6pc","text":"Remove the medium from the organoids and add   of TrypLE Express supplemented with 10 μM Y-27632 to each well. Scrape the Matrigel off the bottom of the wells with a 1,000-μl pipette. Split the organoids in 2-4 15 mL Falcons to have smaller volume for the dissociation process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2alcc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"94C3B140A62F11EDBD7AEB18915A9C43","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ac3t0","text":"Place the tubes in a   water bath for  . Pipette vigorously every 5 min, 10 times with 10 mL pipette and 10 times with a 1,000-μl pipette with broken tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fh151","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E3A60A0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"22F46640A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mju3","text":"Thaw Cas9 and guide  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"t9ro","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2B05FB50A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3baf0","text":"Add basal medium up to 10 ml and centrifuge for 4 minutes at 500g. Combine separate Falcon tubes at this stage to have a bigger pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ektb7","text":"Aspirate and discard the supernatant. If pellet is loose, do a second centrifugation step in an ependorf with 500-1000 μl of media left.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmua0","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant. Add   of Opti-MEM media and pipette well to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d7k3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"6366F710A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgj9p","text":"Count number of cells with a haemocytometer (take 10 μl). Determine number of conditions (100,000 cells per condition). You will need to include negative control, no Cas9.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bdj1","text":"Mix  of Cas9 and   of guide (1:3.33 ratio), you will need to add 2 μl per condition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tge7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cfq8","text":"Standard concentration: 5ug True Cut Cas9 v2 (Invitrogen, A36499- 500 μg at 5μg/μl) and 100pmol synthetic guide (Synthego- custom made, supplied 3 nmol lyophilised reconstituted with 30 μl water for 100pmol/μl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pneb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q2ai","text":"Make complex and leave   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90n6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"18FE1860A63011EDBD7AEB18915A9C43","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"1B77A3E0A63011EDBD7AEB18915A9C43","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"A733A619A63111EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A733A6A7A63111EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"877s9","text":"Spin and pellet correct number of cells before washing with   of PBS. Centrifuge at 500g for 4 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5deru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"810ED2B0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edpdf","text":"While washing with PBS make P3 suppl buffer (20 μl/reaction) (Lonza, V4XP-3032).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f85dp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4lia","text":"Buffer P3: 16.4 μl and Supplement 1: 3.6 μl for a total of 20 μl per condition (recommended to make at least 10% excess for pipetting error). Supplemented with 10μM Y-27632, leave at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":183,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dljbl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1FDC8F30A63111ED92009B6A1C516EA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40jea","text":" Completely remove and discard the supernatant. Resuspend in  of P3 buffer supplemented with 10 μM Y-27632 per condition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3up9r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"559473B0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53pf1","text":"Add  of RNP complex per condition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9k64v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"5AB59F90A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42a2v","text":"Add   of warm ENAFI media+ Y+ Chir+DMSO to each chamber. Remove 100 μl into seperate ependorfs. Wash each chamber with another   of media to ensure you have taken all cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"o31h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"B3DF17E0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"B5BCFFA0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"39qjq","text":"Centrifuge at 500g for 4 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eg4at","text":"Remove and discard the supernatant and suspend the pellet with 20-25 μl Matrigel per well. Set up 2 wells per condition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bu60u","text":"Place the plate in a   incubator for   to solidify the Matrigel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"feqv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BC9ACFA0A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BF6D5090A62011ED9808F326611D6E31","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pc28","text":"Once matrigel has solidified, add 250 μl of ENAFI medium supplemented with 5 μM CHIR99021, 10 μM Y-27632 and 1.25% (vol/vol) DMSO (Table 2) to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajo20","text":"Next Day: change media back to WENRAFI (Wnt and Rspo conditioned, Table 1) supplemented with 10 μM of Y-27632.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djtmi","text":"48 h before electroporation, replace the medium with 250 μl of ENAFI medium supplemented with 5 μM CHIR99021 and 10 μM Y-27632 (Table 2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i88f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e625v","text":"24 h before electroporation, replace the medium with 250 μl of ENAFI medium supplemented with 5 μM CHIR99021, 10 μM Y-27632 and 1.25% (vol/vol) DMSO (Table 2).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbat","text":"7 days after electroporation, extract DNA from half or a third of the well using PicoPure DNA extraction kit (Invitrogen, KIT0103). Perform   lysis step for   hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":140,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":157,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bur4m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"517C7870A63611EDAF4913C89F55372A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"5C04B2D0A63611EDAF4913C89F55372A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9l3j8","text":"Expand organoids as previously described. Aim for 10-20 wells of organoids for sufficient cell numbers, depending on the numbers of conditions you want to test. Feed organoids with WENRAFI media (Table 1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c3u7c","text":"Perform PCR using primers that span the guide (500-800 bp) and submit for Sanger sequencing in both directions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kh7o","text":"Analyse sanger trace using ICE Synthego. You will need to upload a control trace (No Cas9) for each edited trace.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp92h","text":"https://ice.synthego.com/#/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":27}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"290354C4A63211EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ice.synthego.com/#"}}}}
